metadata.name: Cloud storage
metadata.description:
In this work I use a film that is a waste product. But at one point in time it was an important part of the plastic making process.  The film in the production process transmits information to other matter and dies itself.
 The spent film is like an informational case in which the memory of the production process is stored.  I wanted to preserve it, to roll it up into a spherical information container. 
This place has no emotional coloring. It is a cloud storage...
